description.value: Primary Energy: Air 5 (levitation and propulsion, flight) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 10 minutes) Range: Self, touch Duration: 10 minutes Total Cost: 8 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Air Potential + Air Mastery + Time Potential + Time Mastery (4d8) Effect: Target at touch gains flying speed equal to their normal movement speed. If weave ends while airborne, target falls. Saving Throw: None (beneficial buff, willing targets only) Success Scaling: 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 8 hours or double speed
